last_episode_to_air.name: Return of the Return of the Jedi
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Freemakers wind up in the middle of the Battle of Endor where Rowan has his final confrontation with M-OC.

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures
original_name: LEGO Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures
overview: Set between The Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi, The Freemaker Adventures centers on a family of three young siblings—young boy Rowan, his sister Kordi, and their brother Zander—known as the Freemakers, who salvage parts from destroyed or damaged ships which they use to build new ones, which they sell in order to make their living. They are accompanied by their salvaged battle droid Roger.

seasons.name: Specials
seasons.overview: These five new shorts fill in the storytelling between seasons one and two.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: The family becomes enmeshed in the battle between the Galactic Empire and the Rebel Alliance when Rowan discovers part of an ancient artifact known as the Kyber Saber. He then becomes aware of his own connection to the Force and meets a mysterious Force-wielder named Naare before embarking on a journey with his siblings that leads them to meet with new and old Lego faces from the Star Wars universe.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: At the end of the first season, the Freemaker family found a new home with the rebel fleet. Their new circumstances bring them face to face with brutal Imperial forces, desperate Hutts, conniving Sith Lords, and the Emperor's latest plaything, M-OC, a terrifying hunter droid who continually modifies himself to fit any occasion. In response to these threats, Rowan's powers grow and strengthen until he has a vision of a sleek, invulnerable ship that can save the Rebellion and stop the Empire in its tracks — the Arrowhead. The catch is, the Arrowhead is a ship only Rowan can build. Once again, it's up to the youngest Freemaker to save the galaxy.

episodes.name: A Hero Discovered
episodes.overview: Rowan meets a Jedi named Naare and learns of the Kyber Saber...

episodes.name: The Mines of Graballa
episodes.overview: While attempting to retrieve the Kyber Saber Crystal from an asteroid field, Rowan is captured by Graballa the Hutt

episodes.name: Zander's Joyride
episodes.overview: When Zander takes a classic starfighter out for a joyride, he winds up in the clutches of Darth Vader...

episodes.name: The Lost Treasure of Cloud City
episodes.overview: A hunt for precious cargo brings the Freemakers to Cloud City...

episodes.name: Peril on Kashyyyk
episodes.overview: Kordi's attempts to save money force the Freemakers into trouble on Kashyyyk...

episodes.name: Crossing Paths
episodes.overview: Luke Skywalker and Princess Leia show the Freemakers the selfless nature of The Force

episodes.name: Race on Tatooine
episodes.overview: Graballa lures the Freemakers into a trap

episodes.name: The Test
episodes.overview: The Freemakers meet Hondo who gives them a seemingly simple job that turns out to be much harder than they thought

episodes.name: The Kyber Saber Chase
episodes.overview: The Freemakers are in hot pursuit of the remaining Kyber Saber Crystals, but each time they find one, Naare steals it away

episodes.name: The Maker of Zoh
episodes.overview: The Freemakers travel to Zoh where they meet the Maker, who teaches Rowan how to build using the Force

episodes.name: Showdown on Hoth
episodes.overview: The conclusion for the race for the Kyber Saber Crystals looms on the horizon

episodes.name: Duel of Destiny
episodes.overview: Rowan and Naare enter into a lightsaber duel with unbelievable consequences

episodes.name: Return of the Kyber Saber
episodes.overview: The exciting battle for the Kyber Saber comes down to Rowan vs Naare vs the Emperor

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: The family becomes enmeshed in the battle between the Galactic Empire and the Rebel Alliance when Rowan discovers part of an ancient artifact known as the Kyber Saber. He then becomes aware of his own connection to the Force and meets a mysterious Force-wielder named Naare before embarking on a journey with his siblings that leads them to meet with new and old Lego faces from the Star Wars universe.

episodes.name: A New Home
episodes.overview: New to Home One, the Freemakers embark on a series of misadventures to assist and maybe even impress the rebel fleet.

episodes.name: Trouble on Tibalt
episodes.overview: While scavenging for the Rebellion, the Freemakers meet the Empire's newest threat, M-OC!

episodes.name: The Tower of Alistan Nor
episodes.overview: Looking for inspiration, Rowan journeys to Alistan Nor where he finds an abandoned city of Jedi ... and M-OC!

episodes.name: The Embersteel Blade
episodes.overview: In an attempt to attain parts for the Arrowhead, Kordi goes undercover at a swanky Imperial auction.

episodes.name: The Storms of Taul
episodes.overview: The Freemakers cross paths again with Hondo and wind up trapped on Taul with M-OC.

episodes.name: Return to the Wheel
episodes.overview: The Freemakers return to the Wheel to retrieve a special part, but all they find are Graballa the Hutt and his team of bounty hunters.

episodes.name: The Lost Crystals of Qalydon
episodes.overview: The Freemakers help a village of Lurmen regain their stolen Kyber crystals from the Empire.

episodes.name: The Pit and the Pinnacle
episodes.overview: Using his unique powers, Rowan leads the Freemakers to a planet rich in Kyber crystals ... and danger.

episodes.name: Flight of the Arrowhead
episodes.overview: The Freemakers have all the parts they need to complete the Arrowhead, but can they build the ship in time to save the Rebel Fleet?

episodes.name: A Perilous Rescue
episodes.overview: Yearning for adventure and excitement, Rowan launches himself on a solo mission that brings him face-to-face with M-OC.

episodes.name: Escape From Coruscant
episodes.overview: Against orders, Kordi and Zander take the Arrowhead to Coruscant in a desperate bid to save their brother.

episodes.name: Free Fall
episodes.overview: Rowan battles M-OC in the upper atmosphere of Shantipole.

episodes.name: Return of the Return of the Jedi
episodes.overview: The Freemakers wind up in the middle of the Battle of Endor where Rowan has his final confrontation with M-OC.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: At the end of the first season, the Freemaker family found a new home with the rebel fleet. Their new circumstances bring them face to face with brutal Imperial forces, desperate Hutts, conniving Sith Lords, and the Emperor's latest plaything, M-OC, a terrifying hunter droid who continually modifies himself to fit any occasion. In response to these threats, Rowan's powers grow and strengthen until he has a vision of a sleek, invulnerable ship that can save the Rebellion and stop the Empire in its tracks — the Arrowhead. The catch is, the Arrowhead is a ship only Rowan can build. Once again, it's up to the youngest Freemaker to save the galaxy.
